label: landIdentityInfo
comment: The unique land identification information corresponding to this observation.

label: cropArea
comment: Area of the agricultural land used for cultivation, i.e, the arable land area.

label: ownershipType
comment: The type of ownership of the entity corresponding to this observation. ENUM: [Lease, Rent, Own]

label: landExtent
comment: Area of the land corresponding to this observation.

label: location
comment: The location mapping the boundaries of the land parcel corresponding to the observation.

label: sowingDate
comment: The date at which the crop has been sown in the farm corresponding to this observation.

label: harvestDate
comment: The date at which the crop has been harvested in the farm corresponding to this observation.

label: capitalInfo
comment: The income and expenditure information corresponding to the entity.

label: observationDateTime
comment: Last reported time of observation.

label: localeInfo
comment: Locale information corresponding to this observation.

label: irrigationSource
comment: The source of irrigation for a land, such as well, canals, tanks, borewell, etc

label: ownerInfo
comment: Details of the person who owns the entity corresponding to this observation.

label: lessorInfo
comment: Details of the person who leases the entity corresponding to this observation.

label: landClassName
comment: The name of the land classification as assigned by the government. Land classification can be based on several aspects such as type of land settlements, resource availability, irrigation etc.

label: landClassCode
comment: The code of land classification as assigned by the government. Land classification can be based on several aspects such as type of land settlements, resource availability, irrigation etc.

label: cropAge
comment: The age of the crop species (in days) corresponding to the observation

label: cropNameCommon
comment: The common/local name of the crop species corresponding to the observation.

label: cropHeight
comment: The height of the crop corresponding to this observation.

label: targetYield
comment: The desired or expected level of production for a specific agricultural crop within a given area or field.

label: previousCropName
comment: The name of the crop that was cultivated prior to the current crop in the land/ soil corresponding to this observation.

label: irrigationCount
comment: The total number times the farm has been irrigated corresponding to this observation.

label: nextCropName
comment: The name of the crop that will be cultivated in the upcoming season orresponding to this observation.

label: irrigationMethod
comment: The types of irrigating crops include surface irrigation, flooded field irrigation, drip irrigation, sprinkler irrigation, and subsurface irrigation.

label: cropHealth
comment: The condition of the crop cultivated in the farm corresponding to this observation.

label: waterCoverage
comment: The extent of the area covered by water during the irrigation process on a farm.

label: plantingMethod
comment: The techniques and practices such as drill seeding, broadcasting, transplanting, etc. used to plant the crops for cultivation.

label: cropCode
comment: The unique code for the crop species corresponding to this observation.

label: season
comment: Represents specific time of the year that has distinct weather patterns and conditions, such as summer, autumn (fall), etc.
